item.title: EP 960 - The Disaster That Saved Lives
item.itunes:title: The Disaster That Saved Lives
item.description:
Today we meet a bloody ghost in Alaska, and then we travel to Texas to take a look at a horrific disaster . . . that continues to save lives!
